html:
2025-0937
2025-12-12ECCC, HCCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999Landfill Methane RegulationsLandfill Methane Regulations in order to (1) prohibit venting of landfill gas, with limited exceptions; 2) require for destruction of methane in recovered landfill gas; 3) comply with surface methane concentration limits and monitoring and corrective action requirements if measurements reveal that specified limits have been exceeded; 4) detect and repair methane leaks in the landfill gas management system; and 5) monitor wellfields to identify potential methane leaks that must be repaired.Registration: SOR/2025-279 Publication Date: 2025-12-31
subject: Landfill Methane Regulations
precis: Landfill Methane Regulations in order to (1) prohibit venting of landfill gas, with limited exceptions; 2) require for destruction of methane in recovered landfill gas; 3) comply with surface methane concentration limits and monitoring and corrective action requirements if measurements reveal that specified limits have been exceeded; 4) detect and repair methane leaks in the landfill gas management system; and 5) monitor wellfields to identify potential methane leaks that must be repaired.
